page.title: 12HESKIN VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Many activities take place in Heskin Village Hall.Sequence Dancing is usually on Mondays at half past seven. It finishes at ten o'clock and the people have lots of fun.Also at the Village Hall they have the Over Sixties Club,at this they talk and play dominoes.They have65 members and welcome more.The Playgroup takes place every Tuesday and Thursday,it starts at 1.20pm and finishes at 3.10pm. The activities that take place are painting baking and finger rhymes.Karate is also one of the activities,it is on Wednesday evening and starts at 6.00pm to 8.00pm it is a well liked activity with fun and games. Heskin Football Club formed 1923. Teams in two leagues.They play on the "Meadows" in Heskin.
